title: Nigel Farage Picks District to Make Run for British Parliament
body:
LONDON — Nigel Farage, leader of Britain’s populist U.K. Independence Party, on Friday confirmed plans to run for a seat in Parliament in next year’s general election, identifying Thanet South, in the south of England, as the constituency he hopes to represent.

Writing in the newspaper The Independent, Mr. Farage said that U.K. Independence Party members in Thanet South had yet to select a candidate for the election but that he had thrown his “hat in the ring.” Despite successes in local and European elections, the party, which wants curbs on immigration and Britain’s withdrawal from the European Union, has yet to win a seat in the British Parliament.
summary: LONDON — Nigel Farage, leader of Britain’s populist U.K.Independence Party, on Friday confirmed plans to run for a seat in Parliament in next year’s general election, identifying Thanet South, in the south of England, as the constituency he hopes to represent.Writing in the newspaper The Independent, Mr. Farage said that U.K.Independence Party members in Thanet South had yet to select a candidate for the election but that he had thrown his “hat in the ring.” Despite successes in local and European elections, the party, which wants curbs on immigration and Britain’s withdrawal from the European Union, has yet to win a seat in the British Parliament.
